- A Brand New City introduced
- A Free Drive mode added to drive through both cities.
- 25 new levels added.

- NEW: Gameplay now available in 16 more languages: Dutch, Finnish, Japanese, Norwegian, Swedish, Vietnamese, Traditional Chinese, Simplified Chinese, Arabic, Korean, Filipino, Ukrainian, Polish, Malay, Kazak, and Romanian!
- PLUS micro fixes on the backend to heighten your gaming experience to the max!

• NEW: Total 20 levels added - 10 fresh ones added to School Duty and Teacher Drive chapters each!
• NEW: Enjoy realistic vehicle engine sounds to rev up your gameplay to the next gear!
• NEW: Now drive in a beautiful Dusk environment!
• NEW: Keep your eyes open for new attractions like Robots, Flying Objects, Colorful and Unique Street Installations while driving!

Update Ahead You don't want to miss!
• NEW: Customise your School Buses, Sports Cars, SUVs and Muscle cars with Decals, Spoilers, Rims, and Neons!
• NEW: Your Garage gets a BRAND NEW Look!
• NEW: Unlock New Chapters by clearing a specific level in the previous chapter.
• NEW: 10 Night Driving Levels added!
• NEW: Watch out for flying distractions & colorful street installations while on Field Trips and VIP Drive duties!
• NEW: Introducing a new VIP in the VIP Drive Chapter - play to find out who it is! :-)
• NEW: A fresh batch of Students have joined school - Drive them to school and back!

School is back in session and we're back with a not-so-mini update for the season:
• NEW: 5 Buses Added
• NEW Feature: Drive students to school in your favorite car!
Plus an enhanced game experience and a few minor bugs fixed for hassle-free drives!

Plus an enhanced game experience and a few minor bugs fixed for hassle-free drives!

Beep! Beep! Make way for our latest UPDATE:
- NEW: Light up all your buses and cars with NEONS - added to all vehicles in our garage!
- With improvements in the speed of our buses and enhancements to our overall game experience, we're going for smoother, safer and slicker drives with this version - Download and drive away!

Celebrating the season of Christmas cheer with this update! Don't miss all our festive feels:
- NEW: Both cities are now fully lit up and decorated for Christmas!
- NEW: Longer routes to enhance your driving experience!
- NEW: Camera Added on Buses & Trucks for a better driving view.
- Plus improved gameplay for a smoother experience!
Seasons Greetings to everyone!
